name: Gunshots, Gangsters, and The 60s Car
description:
A game with a vauge story about a detective who loves his car from the 60s, and a gang who wants all evidence against them destroyed. Somewhat a nod to older beat em' up/shoot em' up games. Made for Ludum Dare 46, with the theme of "Keep it alive."

Made by me, Jeevat.
